title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.224 - Prorate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.224 - Prorate

State Regulations

To assign or redistribute a portion of a cost, such as a
joint cost, to a department, operation, activity or product according to some
formula or other agreed-to, often arbitrary, procedure. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.224

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
